greeting.text: Hey! I'm Casey from IT Support. Having technical troubles? I'm your go-to person!

options.text: How do I use the kanban board?

slow-computer.text: Classic issue! Try closing some browser tabs first - I bet you have at least 50 open. If that doesn't work, try restarting. Still slow? Submit a ticket and I'll take a look!

kanban-help.text: The kanban board is pretty intuitive! Just drag cards between columns: To Do, In Progress, and Done. You can also add new tasks with the + button. Talk to Jordan if you need to be added to a project!
